xep.header:
XMPP Server Compliance 2009 This document defines XMPP server compliance levels for 2009. &LEGALNOTICE; 0243 Obsolete Standards Track Standards
XMPP Core XMPP IM XEP-0016 XEP-0030 XEP-0045 XEP-0054 XEP-0124 XEP-0163 XEP-0191 XEP-0206
XEP-0212 XEP-0216
XEP-0270
N/A &stpeter;
1.0 2008-09-08 psa
Per a vote of the XMPP Council, advanced specification to Draft.
0.3 2008-07-16 psa
Added PEP as required for Advanced level per Council discussion.
0.2 2008-06-18 psa
Changed compliance level names, updated required support per Council discussion.
0.1 2008-05-28 psa
Initial published version, incorporating Council feedback.
0.0.1 2009-05-27 psa
First draft, copied and modified from XEP-0212.

section1.p: The &XSF; defines protocol suites for the purpose of compliance testing and software certification. This document specifies the 2009 compliance levels for XMPP servers. Support for the listed specifications is REQUIRED for compliance purposes.
The XMPP Core Server 2009 certification level is defined below. Support for these specifications is REQUIRED for compliance purposes.
The XMPP Advanced Server 2009 certification level is defined as follows:

ul.li: &xep0045; (support may be enabled via an external component or an internal server module/plugin)
&xep0124; and &xep0206; (support may be enabled via an external component or an internal server module/plugin)

section1.p: Some of the protocol specifications referenced herein have their own dependencies; developers must refer to the relevant specifications for further information.
Developers are advised to refer to &xep0178; regarding proper implementation of the SASL EXTERNAL mechanism in XMPP.
This document introduces no additional security considerations above and beyond those defined in the documents on which it depends.
This document requires no interaction with &IANA;.
This document requires no interaction with the ®ISTRAR;.
